articles.content: A former BBC star has branded the broadcaster 'soul destroying' for the 'hoops' it makes people jump through to get a show greenlit - adding that his podcast fronted by two men would have 'no chance'… [+5114 chars]

articles.title: The Queen intervened over fears IRA were attempting to capture her cousin during Troubles, new book reveals - Belfast Telegraph
articles.description: The Queen personally intervened to prevent the IRA from being able to capture the Duke of Kent during his deployment in Belfast in the 1970s.
articles.content:
